title: Please Riot
body: So ever since the Shaco rework his winrate has gone up  especially with the AD Bruiser build. However when building a AD heavy build involving ghostblade steraks and other AD heavy items you struggle to kill people. I think the reason people build into bruiser for shaco is because he's now a better tank than assassin, and not to mention all of the shaco mains in korea non-stop complain about the state of him. So is there any chance that we could possibly have the old shaco return? because right now he's broken and not in the overpowered way :(
